channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Canadian youth have put hockey on thin ice: As participation declines, the future on the beloved pastime is precarious
item.description: Hockey Canada reported a 35% drop in youth hockey participation compared to 13 years ago.

item.title: Cryptocurrencies fall as investors await Fed decision, bitcoin dips under $67,000
item.description: Cryptocurrencies slumped on Tuesday as bitcoin extended its recent slide and investors awaited the Federal Reserve's next rate decision.

item.title: Many older adults ‘will die homeless,’ as home prices surge and safety nets fail
'The world might become stuck in the slow lane'—World Bank warns of the consequences of sustaining elevated interest rates
item.description: "We need to avoid lower-for-longer economic growth around the world," said The World Bank's deputy chief economist Ayhan Kose.

item.title: Wall Street expects Apple's AI updates to power a strong upgrade cycle
item.description: Wall Street lauded Apple after the iPhone maker debuted its long-anticipated artificial intelligence vision during its Worldwide Developers Conference Monday.

item.title: Apple worth $190 billion more, as stock tops S&P 500 for first time in years
Ambition Mastercard® review: Build credit in college on your terms
item.description: The Ambition Mastercard® is a hybrid secured card with no credit check and a flexible deposit.

item.title: Boeing sales tumble as the company gets no orders for the 737 Max for the second straight month
item.description: The results released Tuesday compared unfavorably with Europe's Airbus, which reported orders for 27 new planes in May.

item.title: How stocks fare when CPI data and Fed decisions overlap
No one wants another pandemic—but bird flu has already flown the coop
item.description: The H5N1 virus, also known as bird flu or avian influenza, is surging among mammals and proving itself very versatile at jumping from species to species.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Affirm, General Motors, Apple and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Younger consumers and upmarket ingredients are keys to coffee’s future
Hunter Biden convicted of all 3 felony charges in federal gun trial
item.description: President Biden's son was found guilty of lying to a gun dealer, making a false claim on the application, and illegally having the gun for 11 days.

item.title: GM trims 2024 EV forecast amid slower-than-expected demand
item.description: General Motors is trimming its expected sales and production of all-electric vehicles this year, as U.S. adoption of EVs occurs slower than expected.

item.title: French bonds and euro continue to be battered amid Macron election blow
